[[Adobe Illustrator]] is a vector graphics editor developed by [https://www.adobe.com/ Adobe Systems].
Adobe Illustrator can be used with [[Adobe Flash]] to create graphics for the game's [[User Interface]].

You can download it from the official website [https://www.adobe.com/products/illustrator.html here].
